meanings.definition: A device that adds oxygen to a liquid or gas.
meanings.sent1: The oxygenator in the fish tank keeps the water clean for the fish.
meanings.sent2: The hospital uses an oxygenator to help patients breathe better.
meanings.sent3: The oxygenator at the party made sure everyone had enough air to dance all night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an oxygenator, bringing life and energy to the room.
meanings.sent5: The oxygenator hummed softly, filling the room with fresh air.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that oxygenates.
meanings.sent1: The scientist was the oxygenator of new ideas in the research team.
meanings.sent2: The tree can be seen as an oxygenator, providing fresh air for all.
meanings.sent3: The oxygenator of the group, she always brought positivity to every situation.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as an oxygenator, breathing life into the stale conversation.
meanings.sent5: The oxygenator of the garden, the flowers bloomed beautifully under her care.
